Part three

Some Of My Favorite Projects

Elevate Recovery Homes

React project for a local sober living facility. Built in React with preprocessor SASS.

Decadent Dough

React web app for local custom cookie business. Built in React using React Context and Firebase serverless auth and storage

Clients can order cookies and business owner can keep track of current orders and paid invoices in admin panel.

Fluffy Finder

Mobile native app built in React Native. Mobile app that can take apicture of dog or upload from photos using Tensorflow.js and Google pretrained model to predict with percent of certainty

Integrated external dog breed api for list of dog breeds as well as Ruby on Rails backend to handle auth.
